des:
Your smartswitch can now connect to your Amazon Echo family of devices through the Alexa connected home. After a few easy setup steps, you can control your lights with Alexa.

Once you know the name or group of your lights, you can say the following:
On/Off, Lights
“Alexa, turn on bedroom light”
“Alexa, turn off bedroom light”

Make sure you already have the HomeWizard Lite App installed on your phone and the smartswitch configured correctly.

 Then follow these steps:
1. Next, discover the connected devices on the smartswitch by saying "Alexa, Discover Devices" or by clicking the Discover Devices button in the Smart Home section of the Alexa app.
2. Your smart Wi-Fi lights should appear in your list of discovered devices using the name given in the HomeWizard Lite App.
3. Now all setup is finished, you can simply ask Alexa to turn a light on or off.
